text:
Hi,

I like to request an update to Tomcat to use Axiom version 1.2.14 which is required to resolve issues we're seeing with handling SOAP faults.

Many thanks
creator: loaderr@uk.ibm.com

text:
For starters, what exact version of Tomcat 7 are you using, and where have you found Axiom in Tomcat?

I think that Tomcat 7 does not use Apache Axiom or Apache Axis.

For reference, Axiom is this project:
http://ws.apache.org/axiom/
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
markt@apache.org
text: Tomcat doesn't (and never has in the 10+ years I have been involved with the project) ship with Axiom.
